# Public Commenting

Please see some of the comments we have submitted on behalf of ISEE-NAC:

### Comments on the US Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) Proposed Rules

- April 2021: [National Primary Drinking Water Regulations: Lead and Copper Rule Revisions; Delay of Effective and Compliance Dates](https://www.regulations.gov/comment/EPA-HQ-OW-2017-0300-1864){target="_blank"} (<a href="Comments/EPA-HQ-OW-2017-0300-1864_attachment_1.pdf" target="_blank">pdf</a>)

- September 2020: [Review of the Ozone National Ambient Air Quality Standards](https://www.regulations.gov/document?D=EPA-HQ-OAR-2018-0279-0399){target="_blank"} (<a href="Comments/EPA_O3NAAQS_9020.pdf" target="_blank">pdf</a>)

- August 2020: [ Increasing Consistency and Transparency in
Considering Costs and Benefits in the Rulemaking Process](https://www.regulations.gov/document?D=EPA-HQ-OAR-2020-0044-0662){target="_blank"} (<a href="Comments/ISEE_NA_CostBenefitsComments8-3-20.pdf" target="_blank">pdf</a>)

- June 2020: [Review of the National Ambient Air Quality Standards for Particulate Matter](https://www.regulations.gov/document?D=EPA-HQ-OAR-2015-0072-0676){target="_blank"} (<a href="Comments/PM_NAAQS_0620.pdf" target="_blank">pdf</a>)

- May 2020: [Strengthening Transparency in Regulatory Science](https://www.regulations.gov/document?D=EPA-HQ-OA-2018-0259-11473){target="_blank"} (<a href="Comments/TransparencyRule_0520.pdf" target="_blank">pdf</a>)

- April 2019: [National Emission Standards for Hazardous Air Pollutants: Coal- and Oil-Fired Electric Utility Steam Generating Units-Reconsideration of Supplemental Finding and Residual Risk and Technology Review](https://www.regulations.gov/document?D=EPA-HQ-OAR-2018-0794-1184){target="_blank"} (<a href="Comments/EPA_MATS_0419.pdf" target="_blank">pdf</a>)
